trans-unit.source: Supplies base class implementation for all activity designer theme classes used in a workflow design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 디자인 타임 환경에 사용된 모든 Activity Designer 테마 클래스에 기본 클래스 구현을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: All classes that supply theme property settings to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes must inherit from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> 클래스에 테마 속성 설정을 제공하는 모든 클래스는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> 클래스를 상속해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Designer themes provide a set of property values with which to display background and foreground colors and styles, fonts, and other style settings for the designer classes displayed on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 테마는 배경 및 전경 색과 스타일, 글꼴 및 워크플로 디자인 화면에 표시되는 디자이너 클래스의 기타 스타일 설정을 표시하기 위한 속성 값 집합을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> class also inherits from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>.
trans-unit.target: 또한 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> 클래스는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>를 상속합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> with which the designer theme is associated.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 테마가 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" /> class by using a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 파생 클래스에서 구현하는 경우에는 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" /> 개체를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the designer type to which the designer theme is applied.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 테마에 적용될 디자이너 형식의 정규화되지 않은 이름을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the designer type to which the designer theme is applied.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 테마가 적용될 디자이너 형식의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer by using the unqualified name of the designer type, while the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer type by using the <xref:System.Type> of the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A> 속성은 정규화되지 않은 디자이너 형식의 이름을 사용하여 디자이너 테마를 디자이너와 연결하는 반면에 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A> 속성은 디자이너의 <xref:System.Type>을 사용하여 디자이너 테마를 디자이너 형식과 연결합니다.

trans-unit.source: A user attempted a set operation when the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly" /> property was set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly" /> 속성이 <see langword="true" />로 설정되어 있을 때 set 작업을 시도한 경우

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow theme that encapsulates the designer theme.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 테마를 캡슐화하는 워크플로 테마를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> object associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />와 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ContainingTheme%2A> property returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> object that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A> used during initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ContainingTheme%2A> 속성은 초기화하는 동안 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>가 사용한 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A> 개체를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the designer associated with the designer theme.
trans-unit.target: 이 디자이너 특성과 관련된 디자이너 형식 이름을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the designer to be associated with the current designer theme.
trans-unit.target: 현재 디자이너 테마와 연결될 디자이너를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Type" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer type by using the <xref:System.Type> of the designer, while the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer by using the unqualified name of the designer type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A> 속성은 디자이너의 <xref:System.Type>을 사용하여 디자이너 테마를 디자이너 형식과 연결하는 반면에 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A> 속성은 정규화되지 않은 디자이너 형식의 이름을 사용하여 디자이너 테마를 디자이너와 연결합니다.

trans-unit.source: Possible values for this property include <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, and any classes created by activity designer developers that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성이 가질 수 있는 값에는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> 및 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>를 상속한 Activity Designer 개발자가 만든 클래스가 포함됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A user attempted a set operation when the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly" /> property was set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly" /> 속성이 <see langword="true" />로 설정되어 있을 때 set 작업을 시도한 경우

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 관리되는 리소스와 관리되지 않는 리소스를 모두 해제하려면 <see langword="true" />로 설정하고, 관리되지 않는 리소스만 해제하려면 <see langword="false" />로 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" />에서 사용하는 관리되지 않는 리소스를 해제하고, 관리되는 리소스를 선택적으로 해제할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Allows the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" /> to attempt to free resources and perform other clean-up operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 가비지 수집기가 회수하기 전에 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" />가 리소스를 해제하고 다른 정리 작업을 수행할 수 있게 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.Finalize%2A> releases only unmanaged resources prior to garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.Finalize%2A>는 가비지 수집 이전에 관리되지 않는 리소스만 해제합니다.

trans-unit.source: Performs further initialization tasks beyond those performed by <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.#ctor(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme)" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.#ctor(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme)" />가 수행한 작업 범위를 벗어나는 추가 초기화 작업을 수행합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> class provides no default behavior for this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> 클래스는 이 메서드에 기본 동작을 제공하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> must provide their own logic for this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>를 상속한 클래스는 이 메서드에 직접 논리를 제공해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty" /> enumeration value that the designer theme should now use.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 테마가 사용해야 하는 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty" /> 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer theme class that the ambient property settings for the designer have changed.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 테마 클래스에 디자이너의 앰비언트 속성 설정이 변경되었음을 알립니다.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> use this method to make necessary changes when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration value changes from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize> to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting> to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>를 상속한 클래스는 이 메서드를 사용하여 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> 열거형 값이 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize>에서 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting>로 또는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting>에서 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize>로 변경될 때 필요한 변경을 수행합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration determines where a designer theme obtains its ambient property settings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> 열거형은 디자이너 테마가 앰비언트 속성 설정을 가져올 위치를 결정합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize> 값이 설정되면 디자이너 테마 클래스는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> 속성에서 앰비언트 설정을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the operating system on which the designer is installed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting> 값이 설정되면 디자이너 테마 클래스는 디자이너가 설치된 운영 체제에서 앰비언트 설정을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the designer theme is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 테마가 읽기 전용인지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" /> is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />가 읽기 전용일 경우에는 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" />이고, 그렇지 않을 경우에는 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> is initialized with is not a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly%2A> obtains its value from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>가 초기화된 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>가 null 참조(Visual Basic의 경우 `Nothing`)가 아닌 경우에는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly%2A>가 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성에서 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> is a null reference (`Nothing`), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>가 null 참조(`Nothing`)인 경우에는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly%2A>가 `false`가 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> is assigned to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true`, and properties on all designer themes associated with this theme cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>가 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>에 할당된 경우에는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly%2A> 속성이 `true`로 설정되고 이 테마와 연결된 모든 디자이너의 속성을 변경할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: If required, properties can be set after loading the theme but before assigning it to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 필요한 경우에는 테마를 로드하고 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A>에 할당하기 전에 속성을 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 관리되지 않는 리소스의 확보, 해제 또는 다시 설정과 관련된 응용 프로그램 정의 작업을 수행합니다.

trans-unit.source: This version of `Dispose` implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 이 버전의 `Dispose`는 <xref:System.IDisposable> 인터페이스를 구현합니다.
